00007 // IsTimeOrdered()
00008 // -- Returns tru of the first pulse is before the second
00009 // Static so that only this file sees it
00010 // Useful for sorting the pulses
00011 static bool IsTimeOrdered(TAnalysedPulse* a, TAnalysedPulse* b) {
00012   // Want a to be before b
00013   return ( a->GetTime() < b->GetTime() );
00014 }
00015 
00016 int MaxBinAPGenerator::ProcessPulses(
00017       const PulseIslandList& pulseList, AnalysedPulseList& analysedList){
00018 
00019       SetBankInfo(pulseList.at(0)->GetBankName());
00020 
00021       double amplitude, time, integral, energy;
00022       TAnalysedPulse* outPulse;
00023       for (PulseIslandList::const_iterator pulseIter = pulseList.begin(); pulseIter != pulseList.end(); pulseIter++) {
00024          amplitude = 0;
00025          time = 0;
00026          integral = 0;
00027          energy = 0.;
00028          // Assume one TAnalysedPulse per TPulseIsland
00029          GetAllParameters_MaxBin(*pulseIter,amplitude,time,integral,energy);
00030 
00031          // Make the TAnalysedPulse pulse
00032          outPulse=MakeNewTAP(pulseIter-pulseList.begin());
00033          outPulse->SetAmplitude(amplitude);
00034          outPulse->SetTime(time);
00035          outPulse->SetEnergy(energy);
00036          // Add the pulse into the list
00037          analysedList.push_back(outPulse);
00038 
00039       }
00040       std::sort(analysedList.begin(), analysedList.end(), IsTimeOrdered);
00041       return 0;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void MaxBinAPGenerator::GetAllParameters_MaxBin(const TPulseIsland* pulse,
00045                                                  double& amplitude, double& time, double& integral, double& energy) {
00046 
00047 
00048   // First find the position of the peak
00049   std::vector<int> pulseSamples = pulse->GetSamples();  
00050   std::vector<int>::iterator peak_sample_pos;
00051   if (fTriggerPolarity == 1)
00052     peak_sample_pos = std::max_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00053   else
00054     peak_sample_pos = std::min_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00055 
00056   // Now assign the parameters
00057   amplitude = fTriggerPolarity*(*peak_sample_pos - fPedestal);
00058   time = ((pulse->GetTimeStamp() + (peak_sample_pos - pulseSamples.begin())) * fClockTick) - fTimeShift;
00059   integral = 0;
00060   energy = fECalibSlope * amplitude + fECalibOffset;
00061 }

00063 ALCAP_TAP_GENERATOR(MaxBin);
